text_ruling:
If the Corp uses [Public Trail](/en/card/30057) or another card to give the Runner a tag, can they trigger [NBN: Reality Plus](/en/card/30051)?
>Yes. Giving the Runner 1 or more tags results in the Runner taking tags.

If the Runner prevents taking a tag, can the Corp still trigger [NBN: Reality Plus](/en/card/30051)?
>No. If a tag is prevented, then the Runner does not take the tag.

If the Runner prevents taking a tag and then takes a tag later in the turn, can the Corp trigger [NBN: Reality Plus](/en/card/30051)?
>Yes. [NBN: Reality Plus](/en/card/30051)’s ability looks for the first time a tag is actually taken. It doesn’t care whether it’s the first time an ability tried to give the Runner a tag.

If the Runner accesses [Snare!](/en/card/31054) from R&D and takes a tag, can they still trash the [Snare!](/en/card/31054) if the Corp draws it with [NBN: Reality Plus](/en/card/30051)?
>No. Once a card being accessed moves to another zone, the access ends immediately.
